name: pocket-id
description: Pocket ID is a self-hosted authentication provider using QR codes and secure tokens. It enables passwordless login and account management with privacy focused on local control.

features.title: Passwordless Authentication
features.description: Log in using QR codes and secure tokens without passwords

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Scan QR codes with mobile device for quick and secure authentication

features.title: Account Management
features.description: Manage user accounts and permissions through admin interface

features.title: Oauth2 Provider
features.description: Act as OAuth2 identity provider for third-party application integration

features.title: Session Management
features.description: Control active sessions with ability to revoke access from any device

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Self-hosted solution keeps authentication data under your control

features.title: Mobile App
features.description: Dedicated mobile app for iOS and Android to manage authentication
